question: How the removal of the Deputy Chairman of Rajya Sabha is passed ?
option1: Passed by a two-thirds majority of its total members at that time
option2: Passed by a simple majority of its total members at that time
option3: Moved by Rajya Sabha but passed by Lok Sabha
answer: Passed by a simple majority of its total members at that time
explanation: Deputy chairman can resign from the office by giving in writing to the Vice-President. He can also be removed by a resolution by Rajya Sabha members passed by a simple majority. When such resolution is under consideration, Deputy Chairman cannot preside over a sitting of the House, but he may be present and participate in proceedings.
